pkgmetadata.longdescription: GUI client for XMPP (Jabber) instant messaging protocol. It's writen in Tcl/Tk, and works on many platforms.

use.flag: Enables installation additional contrib components ('contrib' dir), don't confuse with tkabber-contrib repo name for third party plugins
Enables installation examples of configs, tools, xrdb, etc ('examples' dir)
Enables installation the extra third party plugins
Enables sound event support with dev-tcltk/snack
Enables support for tray icon with dev-tcltk/tktray
Enables support for DNS resolving over UDP.
Skips any kind of source patching (and epatch_user too).
Patches sources with path to installed external plugins. Likely will be useful when 'plugins' or '3rd-party-plugins' USE flags are enabled.
